name: Anmol Singh Jaggi
body:
![My photo](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0Bw239KLrN7zoNUJGMmE5T25aN0U/view?usp=sharing)

### Introduction
I am a student at [Delhi Technological University](http://dtu.ac.in/) pursuing Computer Engineering.

### Interests
 - I have a keen interest in [competitive programming](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Competitive_programming), and have participated in the [ACM-ICPC](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ACM_International_Collegiate_Programming_Contest) Asia Regionals twice.
 - I also love to develop extensible and maintainable software applications and have [open-sourced a few of them](https://github.com/Anmol-Singh-Jaggi).
 - Apart from this, in my free time, I like to browse [StackOverflow](http://stackoverflow.com/users/1925388/anmol-singh-jaggi) and answer any questions which I can.
 - Occasionally, I like to spend some time on [Quora](https://www.quora.com/Anmol-Singh-Jaggi) discovering new things about diverse field ranging from to `indian food` to `world economy`.
 - I maintain a [blog](https://anmolsinghjaggi.wordpress.com/) in which I post content about any new interesting things which I encounter.
 - I also like to play football.

### Portfolio
 - You can have a look at my open-source contributions by visiting my [Github profile](https://github.com/Anmol-Singh-Jaggi)
 - [My Resume](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0Bw239KLrN7zoR1o5ektCRkl3SGM/view)
